mapper.select: select count(*) from chat_room cr join chat_room_member crm1 on cr.chat_room_seq = crm1.chat_room_seq join chat_room_member crm2 on cr.chat_room_seq = crm2.chat_room_seq where crm1.emp_no = #{emp_no1} and crm2.emp_no = #{emp_no2} and cr.chat_room_code = 'P'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (chat_room_seq, chat_room_name, chat_room_code, created_by, create_date, is_read) VALUES (chat_room_seq.nextval, #{chat_room_name}, #{chat_room_code}, #{emp_no2}, sysdate, 0)
INSERT INTO chat_room (chat_room_seq, chat_room_name, chat_room_code, created_by, create_date, is_read) VALUES (chat_room_seq.nextval, #{chat_room_name}, 'G', #{creater}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select e.name, cr.chat_room_name from employee e join chat_room_member crm on e.emp_no = crm.emp_no join chat_room cr on cr.chat_room_seq = crm.chat_room_seq where cr.chat_room_seq = #{chat_room_seq}
